pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="1" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="bsBAHZM0luSOV2RQwTxr-1" value="<br><div style="color: #448c27;font-weight: bold;">Figure 6.8</span><span style="color: #333333;"> Good cover and visibility</span></div></div><div><br/></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;" parent="1"
